thread.title: Super Bowl 51: Tom Brady pick six gives Falcons 21-0 lead over Patriots
thread.title_full: Super Bowl 51: Tom Brady pick six gives Falcons 21-0 lead over Patriots

author: Zac Al-Khateeb (zac.alkhateeb@sportingnews.com)
title: Super Bowl 51: Tom Brady pick six gives Falcons 21-0 lead over Patriots
text:
â NFL (@NFL) February 6, 2017 
The second-worst part? Brady's failed tackle attempt on the interception return: please enjoy Tom Brady diving and missing the tackle on the pick 6 pic.twitter.com/yYOqNWtZdB â Danny (@recordsANDradio) February 6, 2017 
Alford jumped the Brady pass and returned it 82 yards for the score. It was the fifth interception thrown by Brady in seven Super Bowl appearances, and the first time he had thrown a pick-six in 34 career postseason games.Â 
As of halftime, Brady had completed 15 of 25 passes for 179 yards, no touchdowns ... and that interception. 
Ron Clements contributed to this report. Watch This
